update sys_tenant_channel_statistics
total_amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recharge_num = #{rechargeNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recharge_amount = #{rechargeAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
withdraw_num = #{withdrawNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
withdraw_amount = #{withdrawAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_award_amount = #{upAwardAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lower_award_amount = #{lowerAwardAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
under_commission = #{underCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
agent_commission = #{agentCommission,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
install_num = #{installNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
increased_binding = #{increasedBinding,jdbcType=BIGINT},
active_num = #{activeNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
increased_num = #{increasedNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recharge_first = #{rechargeFirst,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recharge_amount_first = #{rechargeAmountFirst,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recharge_increased_num = #{rechargeIncreasedNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},

performance = #{performance,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
